episode: There was a point in time, long ago, when I was devastated by an action my wife took. To be more specific she just got up and walked out on me. I really was devastated because she would never allow me to contact her by phone or text.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was devastated because my wife, who I loved dearly, got up and walked out on me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must have been really tough for you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was, it was very emotional. She even would not allow me to contact her by phone or text.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really harsh, it sounds like she needed space, but it's still hurtful.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That's true, the only think that really saved me was constant proayer.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's beautiful, prayer can be a great source of comfort during tough times.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: After praing and being alone for a few months, I volunteered for meals on wheels to move on.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Helping others can be a great way to heal and find purpose again.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That lasted for a couple of months, then I volunteered at the local hospital.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It sounds like you were really trying to stay busy and focus on giving back.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, my mind had to be occupied.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Keeping your mind occupied can help take the edge off the pain.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I didn't hear from her for two years, then I had a call from her after she had an accident.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must have been a shock, especially after two years of silence.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, but I still had deep feelings for her.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's clear you still cared about her deeply, even after all that time.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: After her accident she needed to heal after a major operation so I welcomed her back into my home.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's incredibly kind of you, taking her back in after everything she'd put you through.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Well I figured she had her reasons and like you said, maybe she just needed space.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're a very forgiving person, it sounds like you still loved her deeply.
